name: aim true
description: melee and ranged attacks will always hit their target.this applies to magic attacks even if the phase ability is in play.see true strike ability.

name: aimless
description: all monsters have the scattershot ability.scattershot can target camouflaged monsters.

name: are you not entertained?
description: players may play one additional gladiator card per battle. gladiator cards possess the bloodlust ability, and may be purchased with merits after joining a guilduse a summoner with conscript to play 2 gladiator cards within this ruleset!

name: armored up
description: all monsters get a +2 armor buff at the beginning of the game.use void armor to ensure that magic attacks strike armor first.use shatter or piercing to destroy your opponent's armor more effectively. see protect ability.

name: back to basics
description: monsters lose all abilities. summoner effects are still active (ie: yodin zaku).

name: briar patch
description: all monsters receive the thorns ability at the start of the battle. enemy monsters that use melee attacks receive damage back.damage returned is equal to damage of the attacker divided by 2, rounded up.melee attack monsters with the reflection shield ability do not take damage from thorns.the amplify ability increases damage.

name: broken arrows
description: monsters with ranged attacks cannot be used.monsters with 2 types of attack (which include ranged) cannot be used.

name: close range
description: monsters with ranged attacks are allowed to attack in the first position.see close range ability

name: counterspell
description: all monsters receive the magic reflect ability at the start of the battle. enemy monsters that attack with magic receive damage back.damage returned is equal to the damage of the attacker divided by 2, rounded up.magic monsters with the reflection shield ability do not take damage from reflected magic attacks.the amplify ability increases damage.

name: earthquake
description: all non-flying monsters take 2 physical damage at the end of every turn. snared monsters are considered non-flying. since the damage given is physical, it can be reduced to 1 if the monster has the shield ability.see flying ability.

name: equalizer
description: all monsters start with the same health, based on the highest health on either team.buffs and debuffs are done afterward - this impacts base health.

name: equal opportunity
description: all units gain the opportunity ability which allows them to attack the unit with the lowest health on the enemy team.see ability override chart below.

name: even stevens
description: only monsters with even mana costs may be used.this rule does not apply to summoners.

name: explosive weaponry
description: all monsters gain the blast ability.additional damage is equivalent to main damage divided by 2, rounded up.include a monster with reflection shield in your lineup to absorb blast damage and protect your back line.

name: fire & regret
description: all monsters receive the return fire ability at the start of the battle. enemy monsters that attack with ranged attacks receive damage back.damage returned is equal to damage of the attacker divided by 2, rounded up.ranged attack monsters with the reflection shield ability do not take damage from reflected magic attacks. the amplify ability increases damage.

name: fog of war
description: all monsters lose the sneak, snipe and opportunity abilities. scattershot still works in this ruleset.

name: ferocity
description: all monsters have the fury ability.think carefully before including a monster with taunt in your lineup as they will take double damage from monsters with fury.

name: going the distance
description: only monsters with ranged attacks may be used.consider including monsters with the close range and return fire abilities in your lineup.

name: healed out
description: all healing abilities are removed.this applies to summoners as well. healing abilities include heal, tank heal, and triage.

name: heavy hitters
description: all monsters gain the knock out ability.be sure to include a monster with stun in your lineup to trigger the knock out ability.

name: holy protection
description: all monsters gain the divine shield ability which reduces the damage of the first attack received to 0.divine shield will be re-applied when a monster is resurrected.blast damage will remove divine shield.

name: keep your distance
description: monsters with melee attacks may not be used.use phase, void, void armor, and magic reflect to counter magic attacks.use headwinds and return fire to counter ranged attacks. monsters with 2 types of attack (which include melee) cannot be used.

name: little league
description: only monsters and summoners which have a mana cost of 4 or less may be used.

name: lost legendaries
description: legendary monsters may not be used.legendary summoners are still available.

name: lost magic
description: magic monsters may not be used in battle.use thorns and demoralize to counter melee attacks. use headwinds and return fire to counter ranged attacks. monsters with 2 types of attack (which include magic) cannot be used.

name: melee mayhem
description: melee monsters can attack from any position.prime use case for melee monsters with bloodlust.abilities take where targeting is concerned.

name: noxious fumes
description: all monsters are poisoned at the start of the game.monsters with immunity are not poisoned. this is a one-time application - monsters that are cleansed or resurrected will not be re-applied with poison.enrage is triggered by poison application.

name: odd ones out
description: only monsters with odd mana costs may be used.summoners are not affected by this rule.

name: reverse speed
description: monsters with lower speeds will attack before monsters with higher speeds. attack accuracy based on speed will also be reversed.monsters with the bloodlust ability will increase speed after killing a monster.avoid using slow as this will help your opponent.

name: rise of the commons
description: only common and rare monsters may be used in battles.summoners are unaffected by this rule.

name: silenced summoners
description: summoners do not give any buffs/debuffs or grant/use abilities. use your lowest cost and highest level summoner within this ruleset.

name: standard
description: no modification to the standard gameplay rules and mechanics. this is the only ruleset available in novice.

name: wands out
description: only monsters with magic attacks may be used.use phase, void, void armor, and magic reflect to counter magic attacks.

name: what doesn't kill you
description: all monsters gain the enrage ability which multiplies their speed and melee attack by 1.5x rounded up.the attack multiplier only affects melee units.monsters with inspire will increase your melee attack; demoralize will decrease your opponent's melee attack.

name: stampede
description: trample will retrigger infinitely as long as the trampling monster keeps killing other monsters.prime use case for summoner possibilus the wise.

name: super sneak
description: all melee monsters gain the sneak ability. refer to the ability override chart below.

name: taking sides
description: no neutral monsters may be used.

name: target practice
description: all ranged and magic monsters gain the snipe ability. refer to the ability override chart.

name: unprotected
description: all armor is removed from monsters and one cannot gain armor.shield and divine shield are unaffected.

name: up close and personal
description: only monsters with melee attacks can be used.use thorns and demoralize to counter melee attacks. monsters with 2 types of attacks (including melee) can be used.

name: up to eleven
description: all monsters have the amplify ability.use thorns, return fire, and magic reflect to ensure your opponent suffers.

name: weak magic
description: magic hits armor first before hitting health.add another layer of protection to extend the life of your monsters.shatter or pierce any armor your opponent dares place.
